name: Spaced Bwi Bwi
description:
It's sunday night, and Space Bwi Bwi is the only open place (where you won't get assaulted by non-Federation space pirates) in the vicinity.

Join our 2-person team, our cook (and former aforementioned assaulter) Cassandra, and Rufus, our overeager waiter, in a cosmic ballet to serve awesome dishes to a variety of hungry (and somewhat demanding) customers !

You still have a few minutes left before the diner closes. Try to make the most of it.

Embrace a gameplay centered on imperfect communication: Rufus will have to describe delicious (ie French) meals to Cassandra with unnerving fuzzy keywords, and she'll have to try to understand what is required.

Will the patrons be satisfied ?

Will the tips be sufficient to keep Space Bwi-Bwi open in the future ?

You tell us!

Disclaimers :

Space Bwi Bwi does NOT care about your allergies. Don''t kick the jukebox.

How to play

You'll have 5 minutes to serve as many patrons as you can. The more satisfied they are, the more tips you'll earn.

Try to maximize your score !

This a 2player networked game, you'll need to understand IP addresses. If you don't have UPNP, you'll need to grok NAT and firewalls too.

The server uses the UDP port 22017.

Now, here's how the game goes:

The dining room

Patrons will enter Space Bwi Bwi and will choose a table.

You'll move Rufus, with the keyboard arrows. Go near a patron and click him, you'll see the meal he wants to order.

Try to describe it with the keywords, and send the order to Cassandra !

She will hopefully make a matching plate (or bowl). Go near the tray, take it and deliver it to the patron.

He will tell you how satisfied he is. Try to improve your communication with Cassandra for the next one and cash in!

The kitchen

Rufus will send you notes with a few keywords.

With the mouse, select a bowl or a plate, and try to compose a matching meal with all the ingredients on the right side.

If you're not satisfied, there's always a garbage pail!

At some point you'll want to send it back to Rufus so that he can deliver it, and you'll get feedback.

Rufus is doing his best, so hopefully the next meal will be easier to compose!

Legalese, licence, and credits

This game was made with Godot Engine for fun, and is globally a balecware. We'll define it when and if needed in the trial that will ensue when you'll steal our beautiful assets for your MMORPG.

Everything but the music was made with love, Lucas's kitchen utensils (and a bit of panic, TBH) by Aurore, Bertrand, Florent and Lucas

The music tracks are Space Jazz and Derp Nugget by Kevin McLeod
